scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Contains state publications related to prisons and copies of "The Citizen," a magazine written and published by prisoners at the State Industrial Farm for Women in Goochland, Virginia from Fall 1960-Winter 1966.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p:
Collection is arranged as follows:
Box 1: Issues of "The Citizen," magazine of the State Industrial Farm for Women
Box 2: Documents, Newspaper Clippings, and Other Materials
